Articles.Content:
Mission logs for the JR Centurion 

![UoPsXHN.jpg?2](http://i.imgur.com/UoPsXHN.jpg?2)![SXw9ch7.jpg?2](http://i.imgur.com/SXw9ch7.jpg?2)

After using this beast for a few days it's turned out to be even more capable then I thought which led to the mission report below.

After completing the assigned landing and re-fueling operations at Ike

![2xc7IPG.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/2xc7IPG.jpg)![HWd8Jg7.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/HWd8Jg7.jpg)

![hdGDO0Y.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/hdGDO0Y.jpg)

 Capt Desmen Decided to hell with protocol and changed course. 

Instructing the crew to instead plot a course for Jool 

Unfortunately due to the work experience kid Caldan under Captains orders plotted the Jool transfer while Kenbur was in the bath causing a ridiculous 1800m/s burn and using far more LI/OX then was anticipated.

Luckily for him kenbur having refreshed and regained hes calm tweaked this and managed to take the Centurion safely passed by tylo.

![vHYl6sb.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/vHYl6sb.jpg)

![R3VxhSq.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/R3VxhSq.jpg)

Having the pleasant side effect of needing but another even smaller tweak to take it to Vall

Things went so well that time was spent locating stonehenge and paying respects to the pagan gods that placed it there.

![cCZm5Nx.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/cCZm5Nx.jpg)

![c4AMJXc.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/c4AMJXc.jpg)

The crew now have plans to go even further ignoring the pesky squawk of KSC over the comms trying to reestablish contact.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-02T07:05:20Z" title="08/02/2015 07:05  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 2, 2015</time> by KandoKris**
